module_class=”social-campaigns-block” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Karla||||||||” text_text_color=”#747474″ link_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” link_text_color=”#0582ca” header_2_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#003554″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_3_font=”Montserrat|||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#0582ca” custom_padding_tablet=”|50px||50px|false|true” custom_padding_phone=”|40px||40px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” link_font_size_tablet=”12px” link_font_size_phone=”” link_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”28px” header_2_font_size_phone=”26px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”20px” header_3_font_size_phone=”18px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off”]

We work hard every day to make Socialistics the world’s most respected social media agency.

We’re ready to re-write the rules when it comes to social media and it starts with focusing on what really matters…content. Channels and technologies evolve, change, come and go, but great content stands the test of time. If you can effectively tell your company or organization’s story across all your channels and with the right people, well, that’s marketing. Unfortunately many companies and organizations don’t have the time, money or expertise to pull it off. That’s where we hope Socialistics can fill the gap.

Socialistics is about providing an agency solution that doesn’t feel like an agency solution. We work exclusively with small and medium sized businesses and we do so affordably. Big fancy downtown office? Nope. Expensive, over-sized staff? Nah. Streamlined, results-oriented, experience at your disposal? You bet. Our team’s collective years of experience have worked towards building Socialistics by gaining a wealth of experience, a network of subject matter experts, and a business model that just plain works. No matter what the scope is of your specific marketing needs, Socialistics can help create, curate and connect your story to the world.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”team” _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default” locked=”off” custom_css_after_last_edited=”off|phone” custom_css_after_tablet=”content: ”;||background: url(‘https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Triangle-Down-img.png’);||position: absolute;||height:150px;||width: 260px;||bottom: -50px;||background-repeat: no-repeat;||left: 250px;||background-size: cover;||z-index: 2;” custom_css_after_phone=”content: ”;||background: url(‘https://socialistics.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/Triangle-Down-img.png’);||position: absolute;||height:150px;||width: 260px;||bottom: -50px;||background-repeat: no-repeat;||left: 100px;||background-size: cover;||z-index: 2;”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.7.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.7.5″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#0c71c3″ header_text_align=”left” header_2_text_align=”left” header_2_text_color=”#0582ca” header_2_font_size=”70px” header_2_line_height=”0.5em” header_2_font_size_tablet=”65px” header_2_font_size_phone=”60px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” locked=”off”]

…..

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text module_class=”team-block” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Karla||||||||” text_text_color=”#747474″ link_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” link_text_color=”#0582ca” header_2_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#003554″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_3_font=”Montserrat|||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#0582ca” text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” link_font_size_tablet=”12px” link_font_size_phone=”” link_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”28px” header_2_font_size_phone=”26px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”20px” header_3_font_size_phone=”18px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

A DIFFERENT KIND OF AGENCY

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” link_text_color=”#000000″ custom_margin=”||45px|||”]

The whole 9 to 5 thing never really worked for me. I played the game for a long time, but in my heart, I knew that one day, I would do my own thing. While it took a little longer then I would have hoped, everybody’s timing is different, and for me, it took a variety of things to happen for the timing to be right. And today, I couldn’t be more proud of what we have been able to build at Socialistics. I knew there was a better way to do things, the right way…and that it could scale and be successful. And I was right.

I invite you to check out our About Us page to learn more about us, but generally speaking, we’re a virtual social media agency with people spread across the world. We’re an agency focused on the work and the results, not where, when or how you work…that’s up to you. When I started Socialistics, I vowed to create an empowered environment, free from the restrictive nature that most companies have traditionally enforced. I believe in giving people the freedom to live life on their own terms. Bottom line, if you’re self-driven, entrepreneurial, a great communicator and good to people, you’ll fit right in.

If any of this sounds good to you, feel free to reach out to us to share why you think you’d be a great fit, or check out any of our open opportunities below. 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text disabled_on=”off|off|off” module_class=”team-block” _builder_version=”4.7.7″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”Karla||||||||” text_text_color=”#747474″ link_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” link_text_color=”#0582ca” header_2_font=”Montserrat|800||on|||||” header_2_text_color=”#003554″ header_2_font_size=”30px” header_3_font=”Montserrat|||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#0582ca” text_font_size_tablet=”14px” text_font_size_phone=”12px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” link_font_size_tablet=”12px” link_font_size_phone=”” link_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_2_font_size_tablet=”28px” header_2_font_size_phone=”26px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”20px” header_3_font_size_phone=”18px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

excerpt.rendered: ….. careers ready for your social media to actually work? Contact us today for a no obligation social media assessment. contact us Our values. Trust We trust in each other, our clients and extend that trust every day and in everything we do. Freedom We believe in a culture of freedom. The freedom to live […]
